what: Example raster data for eaTools — ex_raster
title: Example raster data for eaTools — ex_raster
text: package contains example spatial data. accounting_area outline five regions, making accounting area. ex_polygons sf object dummy condition variable (un-scaled). cover entire accounting area. ex_raster 1000x1000m raster grid extent account area, cells randomly classed either 1, 2 3.
